review.title: Tensor SimRank for Heterogeneous Information Networks
review.abstract: We propose a generalization of SimRank similarity measure for heterogeneous information networks. Given the information network, the intraclass similarity score s(a, b) is high if the set of objects that are related with a and the set of objects that are related with b are pair-wise similar according to all imposed relations.

sections.heading: 5. CONCLUSION
sections.text: This paper proposes the generalization of SimRank for heterogeneous networks and a calculation method that exploits the fact that the resulting similarity matrix is block diagonal and therefore its components could be calculated iteratively. Convergence conditions are proposed and successfully tested.
